job_tasks.phrase: Meedraaien in een ontwikkelteam voor o.a. webapplicaties die ontwikkeld worden voor allerlei data analyses.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes participation in a development team for web applications used for data analysis, which falls under traditional software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Er wordt gewerkt met python, R, SQL, GCP, Azure cloud, Github en nog veel meer.
job_tasks.justification: While listing technologies, the context of 'working with' them in the development of applications aligns with software development tasks.
Creating tests is a fundamental part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: er kan veel uitdaging gevonden worden in nieuwe ontwikkelingen, zoals het opzetten van een Kubernettes omgeving die gebruikt kan worden voor de inzet van LLM modellen.
job_tasks.justification: Setting up an environment for LLM deployment, while related to AI, is framed as a development challenge within the context of building applications, fitting under software development and integration, especially when considering the infrastructure aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: B1-K1-W1 Stemt opdracht af, plant werkzaamheden en bewaakt de voortgang
job_tasks.justification: Aligning assignments, planning work, and monitoring progress are core software development project management tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: B1-K1-W2 Maakt een technisch ontwerp voor software
job_tasks.justification: Creating a technical design for software is a direct software development task.
Realizing (parts of) software is the core definition of software development.
Testing software is an integral part of the software development process.

job_tasks.phrase: B1-K1-W5 Doet verbetervoorstellen voor de software
job_tasks.justification: Making improvement suggestions for software is a task within the software development lifecycle, focusing on maintenance and enhancement.

soft_skills.justification: Being part of a development team implies collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: er kan veel uitdaging gevonden worden in nieuwe ontwikkelingen
soft_skills.justification: Finding challenges in new developments indicates a willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and approaches.

profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on traditional software development tasks (web applications, data analysis, testing, design, implementation, maintenance) and lists standard software engineering tools and cloud platforms. While it mentions setting up an environment for LLM models, this is framed as a development challenge within a broader software engineering context, rather than a core AI/ML model development or GenAI specialization task. There is no mention of model training, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or specific GenAI frameworks. Therefore, the role is classified as a Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is quite clear about the core software development responsibilities and lists relevant technologies. The mention of LLMs is present but not central to the described tasks. The confidence is high, but not perfect (5), as the mention of 'LLM models' could imply a deeper AI involvement that isn't fully detailed.
